About Us

Providing a Safe Space for Your Treasured Items

At AAA Storage, we believe self-storage should be simple and hassle-free. As a locally owned and operated business, we pride ourselves on serving the community by going above and beyond for you. With us, there are no hidden fees or extra charges—the price you see is the price you get. We provide a state-of-the-art cylinder lock for free to ensure your belongings are securely stored. Additionally, we offer a free rental truck program, 24-hour gate access, an on-site manager for assistance, a state-of-the-art security system, optional insurance, and no administration fees. Choose Storage Units of Longmont for reliable and straightforward self-storage solutions.

Our Services

Specialized Storage for Every Special Item

Different Unit Sizes

At AAA Storage, we offer a variety of unit sizes to fit your unique needs. Whether you’re storing a few personal items, furniture, or an entire household, we have the perfect size for you.

24-Hour Gate Access

Enjoy the convenience of accessing your stored belongings any time, day or night, with our 24-hour gate access. This feature ensures you can retrieve or store items according to your schedule.

Vehicle Storage

At AAA Storage, we offer secure and convenient vehicle storage solutions. Our facility is equipped with state-of-the-art security, including 24-hour video surveillance, gated access.

Top-Notch Security

We offer unparalleled protection for your property. With advanced security systems and 24/7 surveillance,  ensure your assets are safe and secure at all times. 

Why Choose Our Storage Unit Facility

We're The #1 Storage Unit Facility in Longmont!

Security and Safety

At our facility, the security and safety of your belongings are our top priorities. Our state-of-the-art security system includes 24/7 surveillance cameras and secure access controls.

Flexible and Affordable

At our Longmont storage facility, we understand that each customer’s needs are unique. That’s why we offer flexible and affordable storage solutions tailored to fit your requirements.

Clean and Well-Maintained Facilities

At our storage facility, cleanliness and maintenance are our top priorities. We ensure that each unit is thoroughly cleaned before your move-in and regularly maintained to provide a pristine environment for your belongings.

24/7 and Convenient Access

Our storage facility in Longmont offers 24/7 access, allowing you to retrieve or store your belongings at any time that suits you. With wide driveways and extended hours, accessing your unit is hassle-free and convenient.
